{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = N150 Wi-Fi High-Gain USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_adapters_n150/ew-7711uan_v2/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Edimax |model = EW-7711UAn |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v2 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 25, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Edimax_EW-7711UAn_v2 |sernum = |wlclass = N150 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = micro dongle (w/ large antenna) |vendor_id = 7392 |device_id = 7710 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = NDD9577111404 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = MediaTek;MT7601U;MT7601UN, 1318-BMAL, CTPPG938; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/23/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00R62YNMG |asin_country = GB |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00000861-50Z" and "EW-7711UAN V3.0A" appears :to be silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2333135 FCC photos]. {{see also|MediaTek MT7601U|Edimax}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forums.gentoo.org/viewtopic-p-7778366.html ''Edimax EW-7711UAn'' on '''forums.gentoo.org''']
